# Dietetics

The European Renal association has a nice cookbook as a well as printable patient leaflets (K+, phosphate etc) and further patient orientated nutritional information

[ERA cookbook](https://www.era-online.org/cookbook/)

[ERA patient leaflets](https://www.era-online.org/cookbook/materials)



# Blood pressure

American Heart association has simple tips, blood pressure journals and single picture guide to help patients record accurate readings at home for clinic

[Blood pressure image](https://www.cdc.gov/bloodpressure/measure.htm#:~:text=Put%20both%20feet%20flat%20on,bare%20skin%2C%20not%20over%20clothing)

[further tips for patients](https://www.heart.org/en/news/2020/05/22/how-to-accurately-measure-blood-pressure-at-home0)

https://www.validatebp.org/ has a list of suitable devices (American but still useful)
